dict.acceptation: 犯罪，做错事；把…托付给；保证（做某事、遵守协议或遵从安排等）；承诺，使…承担义务；

sent.orig: When a user enters the SQL command COMMIT, all changes in that transaction are made permanent.
sent.trans: 当用户使用sql的提交命令commit时，一个事务处理中对数据的全部变更将成为永久性的。

sent.orig: If you do not commit adultery but do commit murder, you have become a lawbreaker.
sent.trans: 你就是不奸淫，却杀人，仍是成了犯律法的。

sent.orig: Now you're on another commit, between the one you just tested and your bad commit.
sent.trans: 现在你在另外一个提交上了，在你刚刚测试过的和一个错误提交的中点处。

sent.orig: I don't think that he would commit robbery, much less would he commit Violent robbery.
sent.trans: 我认为他不会抢劫，更不用说暴力抢劫了。

sent.orig: Why mental disease won't commIt'suicide, and can normal person commIt'suicide?
sent.trans: 为什么精神病不会自杀，而正常人会自杀啊？
